name: Airline Logo Lite
description:
An amazing! 100+ Airline Logos Guessing game to test your guessing skills to find the correct Airline Name by looking at its Logo. You see the Airline Logo and choose from the Names options given, its that easy.
Are you a frequent flyer, then take our quiz to find out how many airlines you can name correctly by looking at their logo.

Think you know most airline names by their logos, we challenge you to play the game and see for yourself.
See if you can improve in subsequent run of the game after resetting, and you'll be super excited playing this fun, challenging and thrilling Quiz to identify the Airline Name by logo.
Come-On in, download the amazing Airline Logo Quiz Game!
Also, download the full version called "Airline Logo Pro" to have more challenging logos, create custom profiles, and set your chosen complexity level in answer choices.
Help: For detailed help on this quiz game, visit our website, www.rednium.com.
